message: whether we like it or not - this can never do what Pownce did for us with its bugs and the cool grafitti style theme that I used :( I miss Pownce - thankfully I am still in touch with a few from that era! :) and I love Pownce for those contacts :)
and I have noticed that there are QUITE a few powncers on here!! what happened to the other forum(s)/for(a) ?? there were a few sites where people used to chat once Pownce shut down (the bastards)
i think everyone scattered around.. there were a few i followed on twitter but lost contact with most everyone
kinda awesome.  I still miss Pownce.  (And have a Pownce sticker on my laptop!)
Parthans! I'm glad you found us...this is for sure a different feel than Pownce, but when you get more and more of the old regulars in here, we can get that magic back...somewhat.
Every time I see this GIF, I can't help but laugh REALLY loudly.

I can't hear "Final Countdown" without thinking of Arrested Development. Which is odd because I've only caught bits and pieces of episodes while Tim went through his re-watching phase. I should remedy that. :-/
@blogkitten Yeah! Pownce, Arrested Development ... Good times. But well, Convore and Community are almost as good so I shouldn't feel so nostalgic
I am very stoked that Leah had went and in a sense remade Pownce. Even if it is in a bit  of a more Friendfeed-like style. But sad that somehow i missed that it existed for a whole month.
